question.text: A bus has stopped at a bus stop ahead of you. Its right-hand indicator is flashing. You should

explanation.text: Give way to buses whenever you can do so safely, especially when they signal to pull away from bus stops. Look out for people leaving the bus and crossing the road.

answer.text: flash your headlights and slow down
slow down and give way if it is safe to do so
sound your horn and keep going
slow down and then sound your horn
